question: More people decided to have children in their later age than in the past. Why? Do advantages of this outweigh disadvantages? Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
text: Many individuals think that there is no benefit of having babies at the early span of the marriage. However, some couples don't follow the same plan after marriage. In  further discussion, I will shed light on the advantage of having kids after a few or more years of marriage.

Firstly, most people are graduated nowadays. That's why they think about  future goals and aspirations. There are some steps they have to follow like they have to focus on career and financial condition more. They don't want to grow a child in their struggle period of life. It would affect the child's growth and future. Moreover, they are amateurs when it comes to having a kid. Mostly decide to have some proper information from the seniors. Then, they can easily decide based on knowledge. Furthermore, some persons want to enjoy their marriage life to understand each other's point of view truly.

There are some examples I want to share on this topic. My close friend got married at the age of 21, but they decide to explore things first instead of having a child. It was only ten years later to decide to have a baby. On the other hand, my other friends choose to build a career and get stable financially. So, whenever they are having a baby, then they can easily raise their child. Nowadays, they have a professional job and balance in their life.
In conclusion, I want to say that there are many benefits to flow proper plans for marriage and child. Otherwise, maybe partners can get problems if they get rush into having a child earlier.
